DOC.brief_title: VentFirst Pilot : Ventilating Preterm Infants During Delayed Cord Clamping
DOC.detailed_description: Mothers expect deliver infant 24-32 complete week ' gestation approach consent . When infant deliver , member neonatology team mother 's side provide initial step resuscitation ( position , suction , stimulate ) per guideline Neonatology Resuscitation Program ( NRP ) . At 30 second birth , infant receive continuous positive airway pressure ( CPAP ) breathe well , positive pressure ventilation ( PPV ) breathe well . At 90 second , umbilical cord cut remainder resuscitation stabilization carry usual location .
DOC.criteria: 24 0/7 32 6/7 week gestation birth major congenital anomaly monochorionic twin twintwin transfusion syndrome hydrops fetalis
